mapper.select: select goods.goods_id,goods_name,goods_information, goods_category_id,goods_cover_url,collect_num, sell_num,attr_list,price as low_price from goods,goods_specs where goods.goods_id=goods_specs.goods_id and price <=all ( select price from goods_specs,goods where goods.goods_id=goods_specs.goods_id )
mapper.update: update goods set sell_num=sell_num+#{num} where goods_id=#{good_id}
update goods set collect_num=collect_num+1 where goods_id=#{good_id}
mapper.select: select stock,price from goods_specs where goods_id=#{good_id} and specs=#{specs}
select specs from goods_specs where goods_id=#{good_id}
select key_name from goods_attr_key where id=#{id}
